item.biomech.power_leggings.tooltip2: After a half-second, you gain increased jump height.
item.biomech.power_leggings.tooltip3: Afterwards, each half-second crouched increases jump height even further.
item.biomech.hovertech_leggings.tooltip1: Causes the user to hover above the ground, rendering ground effects harmless and increasing jump height by 1 block.
item.biomech.hovertech_leggings.tooltip2: Also grants the wearer slowfall during falls.
item.biomech.hovertech_leggings.tooltip3: Press alt to toggle on/off.  Crouch to temporarily disable.
item.biomech.drill_arm.tooltip2: Hold to mine any pickaxe-mineable block.
item.biomech.power_arm.tooltip1: Increases attack damage by 2 when wielding a weapon.
item.biomech.mining_laser_arm.tooltip2: Hold to mine any pickaxe-mineable block.
item.biomech.mining_laser_arm.tooltip3: The longer you hold, the stronger it becomes (max 12 seconds - up to 6x faster).
item.biomech.lavastride_leggings.tooltip: Allows the user to walk on the surface of lava.
item.biomech.power_chest.tooltip1: Once every 30 seconds, reduces the damage of the next incoming direct damage attack by 50%.
item.biomech.power_helmet.tooltip1: Non-critical attacks have a 33% chance to instead be a critical strike.
item.biomech.back_scuba_tank.tooltip2: While energy holds, you will have air to breath.
item.biomech.back_scuba_tank.tooltip3: Prevents energy regeneration while supplying air.
item.biomech.back_jetpack.tooltip1: Hold spacebar while airborne to activate.
item.biomech.back_jetpack.tooltip3: Provides vertical thrust.  If an elytra is active, provides forward thrust.
item.biomech.mobility_treads.tooltip2: Speed increases even more after 5 seconds of forward motion.
item.biomech.spider_walkers.tooltip1: Hold alt while walking into a wall to activate.
item.biomech.spider_walkers.tooltip2: Climbs walls while active.  Can be used while falling to grip a nearby wall.
item.biomech.spider_walkers.tooltip3: Costs a small amount of suit energy while active.
item.biomech.iron_mech_head.tooltip1: 3% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_head.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_head.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a 20x multiplier.
item.biomech.iron_mech_chestplate.toolti: 4% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a 20x multiplier.
item.biomech.iron_mech_legs.tooltip1: 4% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_legs.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_legs.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a 20x multiplier.
item.biomech.iron_mech_arm.tooltip1: 2% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_arm.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.iron_mech_arm.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a 20x multiplier.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_head.tooltip1: 4% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_head.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_head.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a 20x multiplier.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_chestplate.too: 6% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a 20x multiplier.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_legs.tooltip1: 5% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_legs.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_legs.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a 20x multiplier.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_arm.tooltip1: 3% of incoming damage is absorbed by suit energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_arm.tooltip2: No damage reduction if the suit is out of energy.
item.biomech.diamond_mech_arm.tooltip3: Absorbed damage harms suit energy at a 20x multiplier.
item.biomech.spring_loaded_leggings.tool: Increases jump height and allows the user to double-jump.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_body.tooltip2: You have a 5% chance to outright avoid direct damage attacks.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_body.tooltip3: If damage is avoided, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_legs.tooltip2: You have a 4% chance to outright avoid direct damage attacks.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_legs.tooltip3: If damage is avoided, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_head.tooltip2: You have a 4% chance to outright avoid direct damage attacks.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_head.tooltip3: If damage is avoided, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_arm.tooltip2: You have a 2% chance to outright avoid direct damage attacks.
item.biomech.pipe_mech_arm.tooltip3: If damage is avoided, you will lose 5 suit energy.
item.biomech.buzzsaw_arm.tooltip2: Hold to mine any axe-mineable block.
advancements.biomech.you_cant_take_the_s: You Can't Take the Sky From Me
Acquire any BioMech part that grants you flight
advancements.biomech.stay_scrappy.title: Stay Scrappy
